CustomField.description:
Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-010968
Summary of all milestones where the Milestone Type = "Billable Milestone" or "Complimentary". This field is updated automatically by the "NI_PSA_Milestone_TriggerHandler Class"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Summary of all milestones where the Milestone Type = "Billable Milestone" or "Complimentary". This field is updated automatically by the "NI_PSA_Milestone_TriggerHandler Class"
CustomField.label: Milestone Totals
